MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH12 postcode area of Edinburgh. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repair work on an underground cable fault we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:36am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:43am on Friday, 04 December 2020
